```bash
gh repo edit HARCOS-AI/docs --enable-pages --pages-branch main
```

### Branding

### Financial Model
- **Free**: All open source, community support
- **Professional**: $25-100/month (priority support, badges)
- **Enterprise**: $2,000-5,000+/month (managed cloud, 24/7 support)

### Licensing
- Fair Source License 1.0 (100% open source)
- All derivatives remain open source
- Voluntary contributions
- No enforcement (honor system)
